snippet.title: Welcome to the world of Still Here
snippet.description:
Still Here is available NOW in The Netherlands and Belgium:
iOS: https://itunes.apple.com/nl/app/still-here-flight-adventure/id1169045178?l=en&mt=8
Android: 
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.DavidSmit.StillHere

Still Here will launch global in the first half of 2018. 
Take on the role of ‘Pip’ and visit places of natural beauty while helping and befriending artificial life. Their plight will set your course for an adventure among the remnants of a human civilisation long gone. Unlock new rewards which will aid you on your journey.

Twitter: @stillheregame
Facebook: facebook.com/stillheregame
Instagram: @stillheregame
